variables-naming-conventions_key1: It is very important to give correct `name` to a `Variable`.
variables-naming-conventions_key2: If you don't give names properly, then nobody will be able to read your `Code`, as they won't be able to understand that for what purpose the `variable` is used?
variables-naming-conventions_key3:
`camelCase`, 
`PascalCase`,
`snake_case`,
`UPPER_CASE`,
`kebab-case`
are five most popular `cases` for naming.
variables-naming-conventions_key4: You can read in detail about the
variables-naming-conventions_key16: Also, to give names to a variable is a skill in itself. Read this
variables-naming-conventions_key31: Note : Many candidates get rejected in their interviews, because they don't name the `variables` properly, and the company does not like this.
